channel.title: Advertising
channel.description: Im not really on here much so im not sure but i registered my server and i went to the link and it said it was verified. And it gave me info to login with but idk what i login to or what really as i tried and they didnt work. So how i try to re-register my server and it says that its being approved? Do i do this or does the site do it?

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @Eclipse639 Eclipse639
item.description:
@Eclipse639 wrote:

[quote=“Eclipse639, post:5, topic:426218”][quote author=ultimatepkvillage link=topic=528909.msg3858251#msg3858251 date=1324503114]
you just login with that username and password it gave you on your server
[/quote]
This is false. ^
If you read it clearly it says something like “You’re server will now be checked by logging in with the following User, Password, and IP to check if it is online”

It automatically does it. You just leave the server online and Mopar will do everything.[/quote]

This statement is false.
[/quote]

No, your extremely wrong. I posted my server today, it was on the toplist within 5 minutes. I’ve posted many servers and I’ve never had to log in with a user or pass. L2 know facts.

Read full topic

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @Dunder_Mifflin1 Dunder Mifflin
item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin1 wrote:

IT doesnt really matter what parts of what post is right. Just leave the fucker on for 1 day straight.

Read full topic

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:6, topic:426218”]This is false. ^
you login with the username and password and leave the server on for 24hrs otherwise it wont register[/quote]

This statement is true.

[quote=“Eclipse639, post:5, topic:426218”][quote author=ultimatepkvillage link=topic=528909.msg3858251#msg3858251 date=1324503114]
you just login with that username and password it gave you on your server
[/quote]
This is false. ^
If you read it clearly it says something like “You’re server will now be checked by logging in with the following User, Password, and IP to check if it is online”

It automatically does it. You just leave the server online and Mopar will do everything.[/quote]

This statement is false.

Read full topic

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

This is false. ^
If you read it clearly it says login with this username and password from this ip blah blah… within 24hrs to register the server… its stating you use that username and password and login as a normal character on your server within 24hrs for it to register your server, also you gotta leave your server online for 24hrs

Read full topic

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @Eclipse639 Eclipse639
item.description:
@Eclipse639 wrote:

ultimatepkvillage:

you just login with that username and password it gave you on your server

This is false. ^
If you read it clearly it says something like “You’re server will now be checked by logging in with the following User, Password, and IP to check if it is online”

It automatically does it. You just leave the server online and Mopar will do everything.

Read full topic
